name: Laboor
description:
THE FOLLOWING MESSAGE IS APPROVED BY CORPORATION INCORPORATED.

Greetings, hello, and salutations to all ghosts. I have come before you today to offer you an AFTERLIFE CHANGING opportunity! I am sure many of you are missing the days of working and are awfully bored of your eternal retirement so Corporation Incorporated would like to formally invite all ghosts, ghouls, and spirits to join our family. Currently, this is an unpaid role, however, I'm sure the experience will be worth more than any amount of money. We hope to see you in our offices soon!
